001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Delete;
006import androidx.room.Insert;
007import androidx.room.Query;
008import androidx.room.Update;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Pattern;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Row;
011import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
012import io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer;
013import java.util.Collection;
014import java.util.List;
015
016/**
017 * Provides CRUD operations on {@link Row} entity instances. {@code CREATE}, {@code INSERT},
018 * {@code UPDATE}, and {@code DELETE} operations are implemented as ReactiveX {@link Single} tasks,
019 * which execute on subscription; some {@code SELECT} tasks are implemented using {@link LiveData}
020 * queries, which execute on observation, or (if already being observed) on Room-based updates to
021 * the underlying tables.
022 */
023@Dao
024public interface RowDao {
025
026  /**
027   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), inserts
028   * {@code row} into the database and invokes the subscribing {@link Consumer} with the
029   * auto-generated primary key value of the inserted record.
030   *
031   * @param row {@link Row} instance to be inserted.
032   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) insert {@code row} into the database.
033   */
034  @Insert
035  Single<Long> insert(Row row);
036
037  /**
038   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), inserts
039   * {@code rows} into the database and invokes the subscribing {@link Consumer} with the
040   * auto-generated primary key value of the inserted record.
041   *
042   * @param rows {@link Collection} of {@link Row} instances to be inserted.
043   * @return {@link Single} of {@link List} of {@code id}s that will (when subscribed to) insert
044   * {@code row} into the database.
045   */
046  @Insert
047  Single<List<Long>> insert(Collection<Row> rows);
048
049  /**
050   * Queries the database with the {@code id} of a {@code row} and returns {@link LiveData} of the
051   * matching {@link Row} instance.
052   *
053   * @param id Id for a particular {@link Row}.
054   * @return {@link LiveData} of the corresponding {@link Row}.
055   */
056  @Query("SELECT * FROM 'row' WHERE row_id = :id")
057  LiveData<Row> select(long id);
058
059  /**
060   * Queries the database with the {@code patternId} and returns the {@code rows} that make up that
061   * {@code pattern}.
062   *
063   * @param patternId The id of a particular {@link Pattern}.
064   * @return {@link LiveData} of a {@link List} of {@link Row} instances that make up the
065   * {@link Pattern}.
066   */
067  @Query("SELECT * FROM `row` WHERE pattern_id = :patternId ORDER BY row_id")
068  LiveData<List<Row>> selectByPattern(long patternId);
069
070  /**
071   * Updates a particular row.
072   *
073   * @param row {@link Row} instance to be updated.
074   * @return {@link Single} of {@link Integer} indicating that the {@code row} was updated.
075   */
076  @Update
077  Single<Integer> update(Row row);
078
079  /**
080   * Updates and passes through a particular row, to avoid repeated queries.
081   *
082   * @param row {@link Row} to be updated.
083   * @return {@link Single} of the updated {@code row}.
084   */
085  default Single<Row> updateAndPassThrough(Row row) {
086    return update(row)
087        .map((count) -> row);
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Deletes a {@code row}.
092   *
093   * @param row {@link Row} instance to be deleted.
094   * @return {@link Single} of {@link Integer} indicating that the {@code DELETE} operation was
095   * successful.
096   */
097  @Delete
098  Single<Integer> delete(Row row);
099
100}
